title: cultural_data_Flores_Museum
text:
ï»¿App Link on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.mgps.gbg.
Application Name: Flores Museum.
Number of Reviews: .
Application Description: The George Flores Historical Center is the gathering place to discover the rich history and cultural heritage of Inalahan, one of Guams oldest villages. And The Flores Museum App is the perfect companion during your visit!Complete information on the history and development of Inalahan from Pre-Latte and Latte periods, the Spanish Discovery and Occupation, the Influence of American Possession, and life during Wartime under the Japanese Army.Legends and stories about Old Inalahan and it's heroes!Pictures and Information about Prominent figures in Inalahan History!Embedded Maps allowing you cellular free navigational aids!Current Weather and Forcasts for Inalahan!A walking tour map with historical sites of interest in Inalahan!The Flores Museum app is a must have for your trip to Inalahan and Southern Guam!Read moreCollapse.
